attributes.action: Allow Alhassan Bangura to stay in The United Kingdom, after claiming Asylum four years ago
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Secretary of State is trying to get Alhassan Bangura (Watford FC player) deported back to Sierra Leone. He came here after being trafficked into prostitution from Africa to France, he ran away and came to England to start a new life. The Government are trying to make him throw this away and make him return to Sierra Leone.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
